desc: Show a fading-and-zooming image in the center of the screen
doc:
Show a fading-and-zooming image in the center of the screen

By default the Hammerspoon logo is shown. Typical use is to show it as an indicator when your configuration finishes loading, by adding the following to the bottom of your `~/.hammerspoon/init.lua` file:
```
  hs.loadSpoon('FadeLogo'):start()
```

Download: [https://github.com/Hammerspoon/Spoons/raw/master/Spoons/FadeLogo.spoon.zip](https://github.com/Hammerspoon/Spoons/raw/master/Spoons/FadeLogo.spoon.zip)

Method.doc: Display the image, fading it in over `fade_in_time` seconds
stripped_doc: Display the image, fading it in over `fade_in_time` seconds
Method.desc: Display the image, fading it in over `fade_in_time` seconds
Method.name: show

Method.doc: Hide the image without zoom, fading it out over `fade_out_time` seconds
stripped_doc: Hide the image without zoom, fading it out over `fade_out_time` seconds
Method.desc: Hide the image without zoom, fading it out over `fade_out_time` seconds
Method.name: hide

stripped_doc: Zoom-and-fade the image over `fade_out_time` seconds
Method.name: zoom_and_fade

Method.doc: Show the image, wait `run_time` seconds, and then fade it out.
stripped_doc: Show the image, wait `run_time` seconds, and then fade it out.
Method.desc: Show the image, wait `run_time` seconds, and then fade it out.
Method.name: start
